title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Update Payment Information?
content:
Users can update their payment details through the app:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Payment Methods'
- Add a new card or update existing one
- Ensure the new card is set as default for future billing
- For issues with payment processing, contact support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"To update your payment information, go to 'My Account' in the app, then select 'Payment Methods'. You can add a new card or edit your existing one. Make sure to set the new card as default for future payments."

title: Can I cancel my reservation?
content:
Reservations can be canceled up to 24 hours before the event start time. To cancel:

- Open the CultPass app
- Go to 'My Reservations'
- Select the reservation you want to cancel and tap 'Cancel Reservation'

Please note that cancellations made within 24 hours of the event may not be eligible for a refund.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before the event starts. Just go to 'My Reservations' in the app, select the reservation, and tap 'Cancel Reservation'."

title: How do I change my password?
content:
To change your password:

- Open the CultPass app
- Go to 'My Account' > 'Security'
- Tap 'Change Password'
- Enter your current password, then your new password twice for confirmation
- Save changes

Make sure to choose a strong password that you haven't used before.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"To change your password, go to 'My Account' in the app, then select 'Security'. Tap 'Change Password', enter your current password and then your new password twice. Don't forget to save your changes!"

title: Do I get a confirmation email after reserving an event?
content:
Yes, you will receive a confirmation email after successfully reserving an event. The email will include:

- Event details (date, time, location)
- Your reservation status
- A QR code for entry (if applicable)

If you do not receive the confirmation email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder or contact support for assistance.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Yes, after you reserve an event, you'll get a confirmation email with all the details and a QR code if needed. If you don't see it in your inbox, check your spam folder or reach out to support."

title: Can I get more than 4 experiences per month?
content:
The standard CultPass subscription includes 4 experiences per month. However, you can purchase additional experiences if you wish to attend more events. To do this:

- Open the CultPass app
- Go to 'Experience Catalog'
- Select the event you want to attend
- If it's a premium event, you will see an option to purchase it for an additional fee

Please note that availability of additional experiences may be limited based on demand and event capacity.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"The standard subscription includes 4 experiences per month, but you can purchase additional ones through the app if you'd like to attend more events. Just check the experience catalog for available options."

title: Where do you offer experiences?
content:
CultPass offers experiences in various cities around the world. You can check the availability of experiences in your city by:

- Opening the CultPass app
- Going to 'Experience Catalog'
- Using the location filter to see events available in your area

We are continuously expanding our offerings, so be sure to check back regularly for new experiences in your city!

**Suggested phrasing:**
"CultPass offers experiences in multiple cities globally. You can find out what's available in your area by using the location filter in the experience catalog within the app."

title: Can I gift a subscription?
content:
Yes, you can gift a CultPass subscription to someone else. To do this:

- Open the CultPass app
- Go to 'My Account' > 'Gift Subscription'
- Enter the recipient's email address and select the subscription plan you want to gift
- Complete the payment process

The recipient will receive an email with instructions on how to activate their gifted subscription.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can gift a CultPass subscription by going to 'My Account' in the app and selecting 'Gift Subscription'. Just enter the recipient's email and choose the plan you want to gift. They'll get an email with instructions to activate it."

title: How long does my subscription last?
content:
A CultPass subscription is valid for one month from the date of purchase. It will automatically renew at the end of each billing cycle unless you choose to cancel it. You can check your subscription status and renewal date in the app under 'My Account' > 'Subscription Details'.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription lasts for one month and will automatically renew unless you cancel it. You can view your subscription details and renewal date in the app under 'My Account'."

title: What if I have a problem with an event?
content:
If you encounter any issues with an event, such as accessibility concerns, safety issues, or if the event does not match the description, please contact our support team immediately. You can reach out to us through the app by going to 'Help & Support' and submitting a ticket with details of the issue. Our team will investigate and work to resolve the problem as quickly as possible.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If you have any problems with an event, please contact our support team right away through the 'Help & Support' section in the app. Provide as much detail as possible so we can assist you effectively."

title: How do I provide feedback on an experience?
content:
We value your feedback! After attending an experience, you can provide feedback by:

- Opening the CultPass app
- Going to 'My Experiences'
- Selecting the experience you attended
- Tapping 'Leave Feedback' and submitting your review and rating

Your feedback helps us improve our offerings and ensures we continue to provide high-quality experiences for all our users.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"We'd love to hear your feedback! After attending an experience, you can leave a review and rating in the 'My Experiences' section of the app. Your input helps us improve our offerings!"
